Values.Value: The Ts_AllowBikes field (with a subtype of Tier x23 in CTS_TrailSegments) does not contain a valid value.
Research whether Bikes are allowed on each segment and then set the Ts_AllowBikes field to contain a valid values which is limited to: (1) Yes or (2) No.
Ts_JoinField <> 999 AND sTs_Subtype_Tiers IN (2, 3) AND Ts_AllowBikes NOT IN (1, 2, 3)
The Ts_AllowDogs field (with a subtype of Tier x23 in CTS_TrailSegments) does not contain a valid value.
Research whether Dogs are allowed on each segment and then set the Ts_AllowDogs field to contain a valid values which is limited to: (1) Yes or (2) No.
Ts_JoinField <> 999 AND sTs_Subtype_Tiers IN (2, 3) AND Ts_AllowDogs NOT IN (1, 2, 3)
The Ts_AllowPackAnimals field (with a subtype of Tier x23 in CTS_TrailSegments) does not contain a valid value.
Research whether PackAnimals are allowed on each segment and then set the Ts_AllowPackAnimals field to contain a valid values which is limited to: (1) Yes or (2) No.
Ts_JoinField <> 999 AND sTs_Subtype_Tiers IN (2, 3) AND Ts_AllowPackAnimals NOT IN (1, 2, 3)
The Ts_AllowHorses field (with a subtype of Tier x23 in CTS_TrailSegments) does not contain a valid value.
Research whether Horses are allowed on each segment and then set the Ts_AllowHorses field to contain a valid values which is limited to: (1) Yes or (2) No.
Ts_JoinField <> 999 AND sTs_Subtype_Tiers IN (2, 3) AND Ts_AllowHorses NOT IN (1, 2, 3)
The Ts_AllowOHVs field (with a subtype of Tier 2 in CTS_TrailSegments) does not contain a valid value.

Research whether OHVs are allowed on each segment and then set the Ts_AllowOHVs field to contain a valid values which is limited to: (10) Prohibited, (20) Allowed - Year Round, (30) Allowed - Seasonally - All Vehicles
Ts_JoinField <> 999 AND sTs_Subtype_Tiers = 2 AND Ts_AllowOHVs NOT IN (10, 20, 21, 22, 23, 30, 31, 32)
The Ts_AllowOPDMDs field (with a subtype of Tier x23 in CTS_TrailSegments) does not contain a valid value.
Research whether OPDMDs are allowed on each segment and then set the Ts_AllowOPDMDs field to contain a valid values which is limited to: (1) Yes or (2) No.
Ts_JoinField <> 999 AND sTs_Subtype_Tiers IN (2, 3) AND Ts_AllowOPDMDs NOT IN (1, 2, 3)
The Ts_AllowPlatedVehicles field (with a subtype of Tier x23 in CTS_TrailSegments) does not contain a valid value.
Research whether PlatedVehicles are allowed on each segment and then set the Ts_AllowPlatedVehicles field to contain a valid values which is limited to: (1) Yes or (2) No.
Ts_JoinField <> 999 AND sTs_Subtype_Tiers IN (2, 3) AND Ts_AllowPlatedVehicles NOT IN (1, 2, 3)
The Ts_AllowSnowmobiles field (with a subtype of Tier x23 in CTS_TrailSegments) does not contain a valid value.
Research whether Snowmobiles are allowed on each segment and then set the Ts_AllowSnowmobiles field to contain a valid values which is limited to: (1) Yes or (2) No.
Ts_JoinField <> 999 AND sTs_Subtype_Tiers IN (2, 3) AND Ts_AllowSnowmobiles NOT IN (1, 2, 3)
The Ts_PrimaryName field (with a subtype of Tier 123 in CTS_TrailSegments) does not contain a valid value.
Research the segment(s) name and enter it into the Ts_PrimaryName field.
Ts_JoinField <> 999 AND (Ts_PrimaryName IS NULL OR Ts_PrimaryName ='')
The Ts_NationalDesignation field (with a subtype of Tier x23 in CTS_TrailSegments) does not contain a valid value.
Research whether segment(s) are nationally designated and then set the Ts_NationalDesignation field to contain a valid values.
Ts_JoinField <> 999 AND sTs_Subtype_Tiers IN (2, 3) AND Ts_NationalDesignation NOT IN (1, 2, 3, 4)
The Ts_Class field (with a subtype of Tier 123 in CTS_TrailSegments) does not contain a valid value.
Research the classification for the segment(s) then set the Ts_Class field to contain vaild a value which are limited to: (100) Trail or (200) Road, or (215) Bike Route.
The Ts_PrimaryUse field (with a subtype of Tier 123 in CTS_TrailSegments) does not contain a valid value.
Research the primary use of the segment(s) then set the Ts_PrimaryUse field to contain vaild a value which are limited to: (1) Non Mechanized, (2) Non Motorized, (3) Motorized.
The Ts_Surface field (with a subtype of Tier x23 in CTS_TrailSegments) does not contain a valid value.
Research the predominant surface of the segment(s) then set the Ts_Surface field to contain vaild a value.
Ts_JoinField <> 999 AND sTs_Subtype_Tiers IN (2, 3) AND Ts_Surface NOT IN (10, 20, 40, 11, 30, 21, 22, 12)
The Ts_CTS_ContributorID_fk field (with a subtype of Tier 123 in CTS_TrailSegments) does not contain a valid value.
Run the '1.2.1 Set Local Contributor' tool in the CTS Toolbox.tbx to define who is contributing the data.
Ts_JoinField <> 999 AND (Ts_CTS_ContributorID_fk NOT Between 10000 AND 99997 OR Ts_CTS_ContributorID_fk IS NULL)
The Ts_PrimaryPurpose field (with a subtype of Tier 123 in CTS_TrailSegments) conflicts with Ts_Class. (All Bike Routes are Connector Paths)
Update Ts_PrimaryPurpose value to be (3) Connector Path
Ts_JoinField <> 999 AND (Ts_Class = 215 AND Ts_PrimaryPurpose NOT IN (3))
The Ts_Manager_fk field (with a subtype of Tier 123 in CTS_TrailSegments) does not contain a valid value.
Research what agency manages the segment(s) then set the Ts_Manager_fk field to contain a valid value.
Ts_JoinField <> 999 AND (Ts_Manager_fk NOT Between 10000 AND 99997 OR Ts_Manager_fk IS NULL)
Ts_PrimaryUse conflicts with Allowed Uses [Tier x23]
The Ts_PrimaryUse field (with a subtype of Tier x23 in CTS_TrailSegments) conflicts with one or more Allowed Use fields.
Research the primary use of the segment(s) then set the Ts_PrimaryUse field to contain vaild a value which are limited to: (1) Non Mechanized, (2) Non Motorized, (3) Motorized.

Ts_JoinField <> 999 AND sTs_Subtype_Tiers IN (2, 3) AND (Ts_PrimaryUse = 1 AND Ts_AllowBikes NOT IN (2) OR Ts_PrimaryUse = 1 AND Ts_AllowOHVs NOT IN(10) OR Ts_PrimaryUse = 1 AND Ts_AllowPlatedVehicles NOT IN (2))

The Ts_PrimaryUse field (with a subtype of Tier x23 in CTS_TrailSegments) conflicts with one or more Allowed Use fields.
Research the primary use of the segment(s) then set the Ts_PrimaryUse field to contain vaild a value which are limited to: (1) Non Mechanized, (2) Non Motorized, (3) Motorized.
Ts_JoinField <> 999 AND sTs_Subtype_Tiers IN (2, 3) AND (Ts_PrimaryUse = 2 AND Ts_AllowOHVs NOT IN(10) OR Ts_PrimaryUse = 2 AND Ts_AllowPlatedVehicles NOT IN (2))
The CTS_TrailSegmentID field (with a subtype of Tier 123 in CTS_TrailSegments) does not contain a valid value.
Run the '5. Optional Utilities - Calculate CTS ID' tool in the CTS Toolbox.tbx to define a valid CTS_TrailSegmentID value.
Ts_JoinField <> 999 AND (CTS_TrailSegmentID < 10000 OR CTS_TrailSegmentID IS NULL)
